title: Global warming is real.
body:
Man-made global warming is not. (Or "climate change" whatever you liberals are calling it.)

You see, the Earth often cycles between colder and hotter times during it's time in the universe. There is a reason why Earth has had several ice ages for example. It's cyclical.

It is very silly how we can't predict the weather accurately for past 2 weeks, but people are predicting the weather beyond two decades.

http://i.imgur.com/0QBbTxU.jpg
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Climatic_Research_Unit_email_controversy

This is of course not an excuse to pollute the environment. We do not want dead fish in the ocean, the extinction of specieis, or terrible air quality like some parts of China where they actually have to buy Canadian air.

In America, and some other countries I'm sure, some scientists science groups WILL NOT receive government funding unless they approve/agree on climate change. How does this make sense? It's a kind of self-fulfilling prophecy.

We've been tracking Earth's temperature for less than 200 years, not even .01% of Earths life, yet we're making all these conclusions of Earth's future. 200 is a small sample size when compared to Earth's age, no? (Earth being 4.543 billion years old.)
